title: My Tottenham cake
ingredients: ['170g baking spread', '170g caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '230g plain flour', '1 generous teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '6 tablespoons whole milk, or as needed', '2 teaspoons icing sugar, mixed with 50ml water', 'For the icing', '130g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons raspberry jam', '1 good handful desiccated coconut', 'red or pink food colouring gel']
